## Upcoming book

After the success of our first book club, 
we're in the beginning stages of planning the next one!

If you have a recommendation of a book likely to be of interest to rainbowR members, 
ideally something with to do with programming/data and also something queer, then [let us know](mailto:hello@rainbowr.org).
